bill.title: Maui Regional System Facilities; Public-private Partnership; Transfer to Private Nonprofit Management Entity
bill.description: Authorizes the Governor, the Board of Directors of the Hawaii Health Systems Corporation, and Board of the Maui Regional System Board to enter into an agreement with a private entity duly authorized to conduct business in the State to transfer any one or more of the facilities of the Maui Regional System to a new nonprofit management entity to manage, operate, and use to provide health care services. (HB1075 CD1)

history.action: Pending introduction.
Introduced and Passed First Reading
Referred to HLT, LAB, FIN, referral sheet 5
Bill scheduled to be heard by HLT on Friday, 02-06-15 8:40AM in House conference room 329.
Broadcast of hearing/briefing available. See: www.capitoltv.org
The committee(s) on HLT recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 02-10-15 at 8:45 am.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 02-10-15 8:45AM in conference room 329.

The committees on HLT recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Creagan, Hashem, Tupola; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Jordan, Kobayashi, Morikawa, Fukumoto Chang; Noes: none; and 1 Excused: Representative(s) Oshiro.
Reported from HLT (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 189) as amended in HD 1, recommending passage on Second Reading and referral to LAB.

Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on LAB with Representative(s) Creagan, Cullen, Har, Johanson, Jordan, Kawakami, LoPresti, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Oshiro voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) C. Lee excused (1).
Bill scheduled to be heard by LAB on Tuesday, 02-17-15 10:00AM in House conference room 309.

The committees on LAB recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 12 Ayes: Representative(s) Nakashima, Keohokalole, Aquino, Ichiyama, San Buenaventura, Takayama, Takumi, Yamashita; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Har, Johanson, LoPresti, Tupola; Noes: none; and Excused: none.
Reported from LAB (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 389) as amended in HD 2, recommending referral to FIN.

Report adopted. referred to the committee(s) on FIN as amended in HD 2 with Representative(s) Aquino, Creagan, Cullen, Har, Johanson, Jordan, Kawakami, LoPresti, Lowen, Morikawa, Onishi, Yamane voting aye with reservations; none voting no (0) and Representative(s) Oshiro, Souki excused (2).
Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Friday, 02-27-15 3:00PM in House conference room 308.
The committee(s) on FIN recommend(s) that the measure be deferred until 03-03-15.
Bill scheduled for decision making on Tuesday, 03-03-15 11:05AM in conference room 308.

The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 14 Ayes: Representative(s) Luke, Nishimoto, Cachola, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, Yamashita, Ward; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Cullen, DeCoite, Johanson, Jordan, Lowen, Tokioka, Pouha; 1 Noes: Representative(s) Onishi; and Excused: none.
Reported from FIN (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 903), recommending passage on Third Reading.

Passed Third Reading with Representative(s) Brower, Choy, Creagan, DeCoite, Fukumoto Chang, Har, Ing, Jordan, Keohokalole, Kobayashi, C. Lee, LoPresti, Matsumoto, Oshiro, Pouha, Rhoads, San Buenaventura, Say, Takumi, Tokioka, Tsuji, Ward, Woodson voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Aquino, Cullen, Johanson, Kawakami, Lowen, McDermott, Morikawa, Ohno, Onishi, Yamane voting no (10) and none excused (0). Transmitted to Senate.
Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 268).
Passed First Reading.
Referred to HTH/CPN, JDL/WAM.
The committee(s) on HTH/CPN has scheduled a public hearing on 03-19-15 9:00AM in conference room 229.

The committee(s) on CPN recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in CPN were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Baker, Nishihara, Wakai, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 1 No(es): Senator(s) Taniguchi; and 2 Excused: Senator(s) Kahele, Kidani.

The committee(s) on HTH recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in HTH were as follows: 6 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Wakai, Baker, Gabbard, Riviere, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Ruderman.

The committee(s) on WAM recommend(s) that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes in WAM were as follows: 10 Aye(s): Senator(s) Tokuda, Kouchi, Chun Oakland, English, Galuteria, Inouye, Riviere, Slom; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Ruderman ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Harimoto.
Reported from JDL/WAM (Stand. Com. Rep. No. 1548) with recommendation of passage on Third Reading, as amended (SD 2).
48 Hrs. Notice 04-14-15.

Report adopted; Passed Third Reading, as amended (SD 2). Ayes, 24; Aye(s) with reservations: Senator(s) Dela Cruz, Espero, Harimoto, Inouye, Kahele, Kidani, Kouchi, Nishihara, Ruderman, Shimabukuro . Noes, 1 (Senator(s) Taniguchi). Excused, 0 (none). Transmitted to House.
Returned from Senate (Sen. Com. No. 599) in amended form (SD 2).
House disagrees with Senate amendment (s).
Received notice of disagreement (Hse. Com. No. 616).
Senate Conferees Appointed: Green Chair; Baker, Keith-Agaran, Tokuda Co-Chairs; Slom.
Reconsideration of action taken on 04-16-15.
Received notice of Senate conferees (Sen. Com. No. 641).
Received notice of House reconsideration of action in disagreeing to the amendments proposed by the Senate (Hse. Com. No. 623).
Deferred one day 04-22-15.
Deferred one day 04-23-15.
Deferred one day 04-24-15.
Deferred one day 04-27-15.
Reconsideration of action taken on 04-20-15.
House Conferees Appointed: Belatti, Nakashima, Luke Co-Chairs; Yamashita, Thielen.
Bill scheduled for Conference Committee Meeting on Tuesday, 04-28-15 5:00PM in conference room 229.
Received notice of House reconsideration of action taken on 04-20-15 (Hse. Com. No. 637).
Received notice of appointment of House conferees (Hse. Com. No. 637).

The Conference Committee recommends that the measure be Passed, with Amendments. The votes were as follows: 5 Ayes: Representative(s) Belatti, Nakashima, Luke, Yamashita, Thielen; Ayes with reservations: none; 0 Noes: none; and 0 Excused: none.

The Conference committee recommends that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes of the Senate Conference Managers were as follows: 4 Aye(s): Senator(s) Green, Baker, Keith-Agaran, Tokuda; Aye(s) with reservations: none ; 0 No(es): none; and 1 Excused: Senator(s) Slom.
Reported from Conference Committee (Conf Com. Rep. No. 8) as amended in (CD 1).
Forty-eight (48) hours notice Friday, 05-01-15.
Reported from Conference Committee as amended CD 1 (Conf. Com. Rep. No. 8).
48 Hrs. Notice (as amended CD 1) 05-01-15.
Passed Final Reading, as amended (CD 1). 24 Aye(s); Aye(s) with reservations: none . 1 No(es): Senator(s) Taniguchi. 0 Excused: none.

Passed Final Reading as amended in CD 1 with Representative(s) Har, Jordan, Oshiro, Say, Tokioka voting aye with reservations; Representative(s) Aquino, Brower, Choy, Cullen, Johanson, Kawakami, Lee, LoPresti, Lowen, Morikawa, Ohno, Onishi, Rhoads, Takumi, Tsuji, Yamane voting no (16) and Representative(s) McDermott excused (1).

Received notice of passage on Final Reading in House (Hse. Com. No. 656).
